abstract: Consumers are eagerly buying into latest fad, the subscription box, which is packed full of items built around a specified theme, but all chosen by a curator; around half the vendors offering subscription boxes are first time business owners, but investors are betting on more proven start-ups like Blue Apron; company is now delivering more than a million boxes a month, filled with the ingredients and recipes for gourmet meals, three times the number it shipped nine months ago.
lead_paragraph: The business is precarious, with thin margins on low-cost supplies, but the interest, in items from makeup to animal treats to fantasy fiction, is growing.

headline.main: Want to Shop for a Surprise? Try a Subscription Box

snippet: The business is precarious, with thin margins on low-cost supplies, but the interest, in items from makeup to animal treats to fantasy fiction, is growing.
